docs.snippet: Working ten hours a day, four men, the four members of the Commission for the Permanency of Foreigners in Brazil, have in a few days decided the fate of several hundreds of foreign exiles from among several thousands who entered Brazil on tourist...
docs.lead_paragraph: Working ten hours a day, four men, the four members of the Commission for the Permanency of Foreigners in Brazil, have in a few days decided the fate of several hundreds of foreign exiles from among several thousands who entered Brazil on tourist visas and continued to remain illegally after the expiration of the six months allotted them.
docs.abstract: comm permits several hundreds to remain; unrestricted immigration barred

headline.main: BRAZIL SANCTIONS SOME EXILES STAY; Board Rules Favorably on Cases of Several Hundreds Who Remained Beyond Visas WORKS TEN HOURS A DAY Rio's German Colony Greatly Increased, but Unrestricted Immigration Is Barred The Commission's Machinery German Heard on All Sides 2 Per Cent Law Amended

docs.snippet: A strong possibility that President Lazaro Cardenas's supporters will seek a second six-year term for him if President Roosevelt gets a thirdterm nomination has developed as a result of the meeting of Cabinet members and other high officials with the...
docs.lead_paragraph: A strong possibility that President Lazaro Cardenas's supporters will seek a second six-year term for him if President Roosevelt gets a thirdterm nomination has developed as a result of the meeting of Cabinet members and other high officials with the President last night.
docs.abstract: Pres Martinez expels N Viera Altimirano, newspaper ed, for urging democracy; J Cipriano Castro urges Martinez not to seek 3d term

docs.snippet: Intercoastal freight rates on most commodities shipped east in the intercoastal trade will be increased, effective Aug. 31, by the Intercoastal Freight Shipping Association, following the increases by the transcontinental railroads.
docs.lead_paragraph: Intercoastal freight rates on most commodities shipped east in the intercoastal trade will be increased, effective Aug. 31, by the Intercoastal Freight Shipping Association, following the increases by the transcontinental railroads.

docs.snippet: The United States flag service between New York and ports of the east coast of South America, which was started on July 2 under the receivership of Roscoe H. Hupper following the bankruptcy of the Munson Line, will be continued without interruption...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States flag service between New York and ports of the east coast of South America, which was started on July 2 under the receivership of Roscoe H. Hupper following the bankruptcy of the Munson Line, will be continued without interruption when the American Republics Line starts its new service on Oct. 8, it was announced yesterday.
docs.abstract: plans for Amer Republics Line's South Amer runs

headline.main: SOUTH AMERICAN RUNS TO BE UNINTERRUPTED; New American Republics Line to Continue Munson Service
